execution_quality: Unable to assess - the task was terminated before any implementation work could occur.
work_category: Session initialization or handoff - no actual work was performed as the request was interrupted before tool execution began.
summary: The task session terminated before any substantive work could begin, with the initial request interrupted for tool use and no subsequent user message. Without execution of the intended work or user feedback, assessment of alignment and quality is inherently limited. The session represents an incomplete interaction rather than a completed task.
follow_up_pattern: Session ended without follow-up; no opportunity to observe user response to completed work.
